features.title: GroupDocs.Merger at a glance
features.description: API to combine, split, swap, reorder or remove document pages, slides, and diagrams.

feature_1.title: Merge multiple file formats
feature_1.content: Seamlessly combine multiple PDF, Office, and many other supported formats into a single document.

feature_2.title: Split large documents
feature_2.content: Split documents by specific pages, ranges, or even extract individual pages.

feature_3.title: Customize document structure
feature_3.content: Organize your documents by rearranging, removing, or adding pages.

feature_4.title: Preview document pages
feature_4.content: Generate image representations of document pages to understand the content and structure better.
